Title: Kill Bill
Description: A former assassin, known simply as The Bride, wakes from a coma four years after her jealous ex-lover Bill attempts to murder her on her wedding day.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: A film that predominantly features chase sequences, fights, shootouts, explosions, and stunt work.

Director.Name: Quentin Tarantino
Director.Bio: An American filmmaker and actor. His films are characterized by stylized violence, extended dialogue often with profanity, and references to popular culture.

Title: Dunkirk
Description: In May 1940, Germany advanced into France, trapped allied troops on the beaches of Dunkrik.
